com.toolrental.data

Class RentalAgreement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.toolrental.data.RentalAgreement

  • public class RentalAgreement
extends java.lang.Object
    RentalAgreement is a bean class mainly with properties, setters and getters which contains the final output of ToolRentalManager.checkout().

    Once an instance is created, it is passed by ToolRentalManager back up to ToolRentalService. Once there, its checkout() method calls the getFormattedAgreement() method here to prepare the final output and response delivered to a user.

    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $Date: 2024/12/03 12:00:00
    Author:
    Michael Escott
